thread.title: Trump is sharp, but needs to lose weight: White House doctor

title: Trump is sharp, but needs to lose weight: White House doctor
text:
Trump is sharp, but needs to lose weight: White House doctor 4:58am IST - 01:59 
After weeks of speculation over President Trump’s mental fitness, his physician Dr. Ronny Jackson Tuesday gave a very lengthy press conference giving the president’s mental and physical health a big thumbs up,:
